Video Crop Video Crop
Gateway to the world to import every direction to meet all your needs.We connect yo to the world.
To make beautiful videos VideoCrop needs access to your storage VideoCrop needs "Storage" to read/write app configuration file and create the working directory, please allow access to your device\'s \"Storage\" .\n\nTo enable \"Storage"\, click Settings and allow permission under the Permission menu.
Do you permit VideoCrop to have your \"Storage\" ? support@gmail.com support@gmail.com 0140xxxxxxxxx Image Exporting Video This app export high resolution video that\'s why it may take some time in video rendering, depending on your video file size.\n\nThank you for yor patience. You can minimize but please don\'t close the app.
